verses.name: John 11:27
verses.text: She saith unto him, Yea, Lord: I believe that thou art the Christ, the Son of God, which should come into the world.

verses.name: John 11:28
verses.text: And when she had so said, she went her way, and called Mary her sister secretly, saying, The Master is come, and calleth for thee.

verses.name: John 11:29
verses.text: As soon as she heard that, she arose quickly, and came unto him.

verses.name: John 11:30
verses.text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town, but was in that place where Martha met him.
